content: explore all the possibilities of granny squares and the granny stitch with this super fun **rainbow granny blanket** **rainbow granny blanket cal** this pattern was a **cal** you can now find all the patterns on my blog ** here 1 ** and as a unique pdf here on ravelry **patterns included** simple granny square mitered granny square half-and-half granny square 3-section granny square 4-section granny square diamond granny square large heart granny square daisy granny square c2c granny square arrow point granny square tilted diamond granny square granny stripe square granny diamond stitch square instructions for joining zigzag border *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 5 5-mm i/9 us 5 uk crochet hook aran 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used a mix of paintbox yarns simply aran **py** *201 yds / 184m per 100 g* and stylecraft special aran **sy** *214 yds / 196 m per 100 g* in the following colors and approximate amounts py pansy purple 247 130 yds 119 m sy plum 1061 100 yds 91 m py raspberry pink 243 100 yds 91 m py bubblegum pink 250 120 yds 110 m py washed teal 232 130 yds 119 m sy aster 1003 85 yds 78 m py jewel 72 100 yds 91 m sy pistachio 1822 214 yds 196 m sy meadow 1065 100 yds 91 m py lime green 228 214 yds 196 m sy green 1116 170 yds 155 m py buttercup yellow 222 214 yds 196 m py mustard yellow 223 85 yds 78 m py blood orange 219 130 yds 119 m sy lipstick red 1246 130 yds 119 m sy cream 1005 1284 yds 1176 m 6 balls **size** 53 5 136 cm wide by 75 190 cm long including the triangle border **gauge** 3 rounds of a granny square in 3 75 9 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me**
